data.prayer: Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the state of Palauli.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Palauli, Samoa
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, help the fearful in Palauli, Samoa to submit to God and resist the devil.
data.verse: Submit yourselves, then, to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 5 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Palauli, Samoa.
Father, help your children in Palauli, Samoa find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Vailoa
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Vailoa, Palauli, Samoa.
Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Palauli, Samoa a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the local leaders in Palauli, Samoa to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

data.prayer: God, guide the 1,727 believers in Palauli to multiply spiritual families that love you, love each other, and make disciples.
